movies.title: Pikachu's Vacation
movies.plot: On a remote island the Pokemon have their holidays. It is generally a very peaceful time of fun and relaxation, however, when Pikachu goes there for his break, he finds things less than fun as he has a baby Pokemon to look after; a baby that is difficult to keep happy and entertained leading to conflict between him and other groups of Pokemon.
movies.simplePlot: Pikachu and the gang learn responsibility, team work as well as cooperation during their Summer vacation at Pokemon Island.

biography.bio: Ikue Ôtani was born on August 18, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), My Neighbor Totoro (1988) and Pokémon (1997).
biography.name: Ikue Ôtani

biography.bio: Satomi Kôrogi was born on November 14, 1966 in Chiba, Japan. She is an actress, known for Paprika (2006), Pokémon (1997) and Twin Princess of Wonder Planet (2005).
biography.name: Satomi Kôrogi

biography.bio: Rikako Aikawa was born on October 7, 1967 in Kanagawa, Japan as Nahomi Kawazoe. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Kaiketsu zorori (2004) and Paprika (2006). She is married to Mitsuo Iwata.
biography.name: Rikako Aikawa

biography.bio: Megumi Hayashibara was born on March 30, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Paprika (2006), Cowboy Bebop: The Movie (2001) and Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion (1997). She has been married to Amiya Masaharu since April 30, 1998.
biography.name: Megumi Hayashibara

biography.bio: Shin'ichirô Miki was born on March 18, 1968 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon (1997) and Pokémon the Series: Ruby and Sapphire (2002).
biography.name: Shin'ichirô Miki

biography.bio: Kôichi Sakaguchi was born in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Pokémon (1997), Hyakujû sentai Gaorenjâ (2001) and Gintama (2006).
biography.name: Kôichi Sakaguchi

biography.bio: Naoki Tatsuta was born on September 8, 1950 in Wakayama, Japan. He is an actor, known for My Neighbor Totoro (1988), Dragon Ball Super (2015) and Dragon Ball Z (1989).
biography.name: Naoki Tatsuta

biography.bio: Urara Takano was born on August 16, 1961 in Togane, Japan as Hisako Takayama. She is an actress, known for The Jungle Book: The Adventures of Mowgli (1989), Sakura Wars (1997) and Saber Marionette J to X (1998).
biography.name: Urara Takano

biography.bio: Mika Kanai was born on March 18, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Kaitou Saint Tail (1995) and Hinamizawa, le village maudit (2006). She was previously married to Kôichi Yamadera.
biography.name: Mika Kanai

biography.bio: Chiyako Shibahara was born on August 9, 1970 in Saitama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Tokyo Godfathers (2003), Key: The Metal Idol (1994) and Pokémon (1997).
biography.name: Chiyako Shibahara

biography.bio: Rica Matsumoto was born on November 30, 1968 in Yokohama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Perfect Blue (1997), Pokémon (1997) and Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999).
biography.name: Rica Matsumoto

biography.bio: Mayumi Iizuka was born on January 3, 1977 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999) and Only Yesterday (1991).
biography.name: Mayumi Iizuka

biography.bio: Yûji Ueda was born on June 15, 1967 in Fukuoka, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Ghost in the Shell (1995), Pokémon (1997) and Cowboy Bebop: The Movie (2001). He is married to Omi Minami.
biography.name: Yûji Ueda

biography.bio: Aiko Satô was born on September 26, 1977 in Kanagawa, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998), Sun Scarred (2006) and Hen (1994).
biography.name: Aiko Satô

biography.placeOfBirth: West Long Branch, New Jersey, USA
biography.bio: James Carter Cathcart was born on January 4, 1954 in West Long Branch, New Jersey, USA. He is known for his work on Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and The Mastermind of Mirage Pokémon (2006).
biography.name: James Carter Cathcart
